original_text:
For my iniquities have gone over my head;
    like a heavy burden, they are too heavy for me.
korean_text: 내 죄악이 내 머리에 넘쳐서 무거운 짐 같으니 내가 감당할 수 없나이다

sentences.original_text: For my iniquities have gone over my head
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 죄악이 내 머리 위로 넘어갔으니

sentences.original_text: they are too heavy for me
